org.apache.pulsar.client.api

Interface ConsumerStats

  • All Superinterfaces:
    Serializable

    public interface ConsumerStats
extends Serializable
    Consumer statistics recorded by client. All the stats are relative to the last recording period. The interval of the stats refreshes is configured with ClientBuilder.statsInterval(long, java.util.concurrent.TimeUnit) with a default of 1 minute.
